attributes.action: Ask David Cameron to lead Europe in resolving the refugee crisis
attributes.additional_details:
Children are dying on our doorstep. It’s sickening to see the deaths of so many refugees trying to find safety in Europe. Enough is enough.

Children who’ve survived treacherous sea crossings are being bundled into the backs of overcrowded trucks as they continue their desperate search – and some have suffocated.

No more children dying on our doorstep. The EU must act now.

See: http://www.savethechildren.org.uk/get-involved/campaigns/shame-on-europe?sourcecode=RC1010005#sthash.CAGt2avN.dpuf
attributes.background: Many legitimate refugees including women & children are dying needlessly because Europe is refusing to take responsibility for the displaced people of Syria and the Middle East. The UK played its part in many wars which led to this awful crisis. Mr Cameron can lead the way, unite Europe & bring hope
